name: On Board (coolFalco)
description:
Our team created an experience to allow users to train themselves  before going to sail the sea.  We decided to set our simulation in an harbour inspired by ligurian buildings and landscape, in the north of Italy. 

The game has a theory mode where you can review technical and legal information  needed for getting the boat driving licence. 

The most important part is the actual simulation of the sea experience. You'll have to go out of the harbour,  avoid boats , orient yourself only by using  a compass and go back to safely dock at the quay. But don't worry there are different difficulty levels, so you can enjoy it without previous experience. 

*

Right now we have only the beginner level, and we plan to extend the shore, but you can already enjoy the game.
